title: First Grade
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
First grade
I see you girl
Alone in the world
Trying to paint in beautiful colors
With an innocent mother
And the story as itâ€™s told, it's not a pretty one
But it's still a story I wanna unfold
[Chorus]
'Cause baby I love you
I don't really know you
But I want to show you
That it's okay to be who you are
'Cause who you are is a star
Who you are is beautiful, beautiful
Who you are to me
[Verse 2]
Hmm
And I know you get discouraged sometimes
'Cause you're scared that your father was right
And I promise you'll see the things that I see in time
Hmm
Now wait til there comes a day
When you get through the pain
And all of the shame you hold inside

[Chorus]
'Cause baby I love you
I don't really know you
But I want to show you
That it's okay to be who you are
'Cause who you are is a star
Who you are is beautiful, beautiful
Who you are to me
[Bridge]
Ohh-ohh, ohh-ohh
Ohh-ohh, ohh-ohh
[Chorus]
'Cause baby I love you
I don't really know you
But I want to show you
That it's okay to be who you are
'Cause who you are is a star
Who you are is beautiful, beautiful
Who you are to me
